biotools.summary: PAFScaff (Pairwise mApping Format reference-based scaffold anchoring and super-scaffolding) is designed for mapping genome assembly scaffolds to a closely-related chromosome-level reference genome assembly. It uses (or runs) Minimap2 to perform an efficient (if rough) all- against-all mapping, then parses the output to assign assembly scaffolds to reference chromosomes.

bioschemas.name: PAFScaff
